translation.en: I wish to shame him with a cutting dialogue.
translation.vi: I wish to shame him with a cutting dialogue.

translation.en: With Abe and the rest of your revolutionaries gone,
translation.vi: With Abe and the rest of your revolutionaries gone,

translation.en: I have a human dad, just like you guys. [chuckles]
translation.vi: I have a human dad, just like you guys. [chuckles]

translation.en: May I be the first to welcome you to your New World?
translation.vi: May I be the first to welcome you to your New World?

translation.en: I thought I'd be all like, "No, don't. I can do it."
translation.vi: I thought I'd be all like, "No, don't. I can do it."

translation.en: Great. Guys, gather as many silver spoons as you can.
translation.vi: Great. Guys, gather as many silver spoons as you can.

translation.en: And for every rule you cut down, another appeared.
translation.vi: And for every rule you cut down, another appeared.

translation.en: ...and then the big dumb one says, "We won Vietnam."
translation.vi: ...and then the big dumb one says, "We won Vietnam."

translation.en: My hand blasters should interrupt the current to the triggering mechanism.
translation.vi: My hand blasters should interrupt the current to the triggering mechanism.

translation.en: No! No! Not like this! Not like this, Martha!
translation.vi: No! No! Not like this! Not like this, Martha!
